author: Bigbudd0045

text: Sadly this game got poorly marketed, at least in Europe. Another thing is the audience. Many people probably want just to stomp turtles' heads, swing their swords and fire their guns. Not dissing those games at all, but Actraiser's concept is pretty weeet. And while the simulation part is a really nice one, condering how well it ran on the SNES, it just had no chance against titles like Contra, Zelda III and the like.

author: D Mos

text: The first time I ever played this game was mere days after my grandfather passed away...it was almost 20 years ago but this music has echoed in my ears over the years. The game associates it with the birth of new life, but for me it also reflects the pain of letting go and a child's first awareness of how fragile life really is...this is such a powerful track, and so moving. Game music rarely touches me so much anymore...they just don't make 'em like they used to..
